description: The Trail Blazers bounced back in style following a loss to New Orleans 24 hours earlier.
title: Portland Trail Blazers too hot for San Antonio Spurs
title_page: Portland Trail Blazers too hot for San Antonio Spurs | Daily Mail Online
text:
The Portland Trail Blazers produced one of their best performances of the NBA season to beat the San Antonio Spurs.
Just 24 hours after a disappointing loss to the New Orleans Pelicans, Damian Lillard’s 36 points inspired a 110-106 win over the Western Conference’s second-placed outfit.
The Boston Celtics are just one win behind the Cleveland Cavaliers in the Eastern Conference after they beat the Minnesota Timberwolves 117-104, Isaiah Thomas recording 27 points.
Damian Lillard
Al Horford goes for 20 points/9 rebounds/8 assists, Isaiah Thomas scores 27, and the Celtics down the Timberwolves 117-104! #HighFive pic.twitter.com/uZFXUuWgbL — Boston Celtics (@celtics) March 16, 2017
The Houston Rockets racked up an impressive win over the Los Angeles Lakers, winning 139-100, with Lou Williams scoring 30 points.
There were also wins for the Dallas Mavericks, the Indiana Pacers, the Miami Heat, the Utah Jazz, the Memphis Grizzlies, the Sacramento Kings and the Milwaukee Bucks.
